body_html:
Hi, I am using pytorch 0.2.0_4, but I cannot use lr_scheduler still.

Python 3.5.4 |Anaconda, Inc.| (default, Oct  5 2017, 08:00:22) 
Type 'copyright', 'credits' or 'license' for more information
IPython 6.1.0 -- An enhanced Interactive Python. Type '?' for help.

In [1]: import torch

In [2]: torch.__version__
Out[2]: '0.2.0_4'

In [3]: torch.optim.lr_scheduler
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-3-a472c70f0769> in <module>()
----> 1 torch.optim.lr_scheduler

AttributeError: module 'torch.optim' has no attribute 'lr_scheduler'

body:
Hi, I am using pytorch 0.2.0_4, but I cannot use lr_scheduler still.
```python
Python 3.5.4 |Anaconda, Inc.| (default, Oct  5 2017, 08:00:22) 
Type 'copyright', 'credits' or 'license' for more information
IPython 6.1.0 -- An enhanced Interactive Python. Type '?' for help.

In [1]: import torch

In [2]: torch.__version__
Out[2]: '0.2.0_4'

In [3]: torch.optim.lr_scheduler
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AttributeError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-3-a472c70f0769> in <module>()
----> 1 torch.optim.lr_scheduler

AttributeError: module 'torch.optim' has no attribute 'lr_scheduler'
```
